snippet: VOLKMAR--Isaac. The path we walked yearns your shadow. . . engulfed in your memory and wrapped in love a new day begins. For us a day without beginning, without end, just a continuation. . . we feel you. . . we love you. For children with a promise inside, a day is brightened with your light of love and hope. And the pain becomes the truth and the truth becomes the light and the light becomes redeeming. Sweetie boy, I know your soul has always been blessed. . . for us and for many you are a blessing, an angel and pure love. We miss you and love you. Dad (pops) 1/3

Sweetie boy, I know your soul has always been blessed. . . for us and for many you are a blessing, an angel and pure love. We miss you and love you. Dad (pops) 1/3
